name: Help! I Can't Stop Running Until I Touch The Targets
name_original: Help! I Can't Stop Running Until I Touch The Targets
description:
Full Title: Help! I Can't Stop Running Until I Touch The Target

Controls

  • A/D to move left/right.
  • W/Space to Jump.
  • S to crouch.
  • Double tap S in the air to fast fall.
  • Hold down S while fast falling to roll.
  • Esc to Pause the game while in a level.
  • Hit R to quickly restart the level.

Author Notes

Here is a game I made so that I could learn the Godot game engine. Touch all the targets to beat the level and try to do it as fast as you can. There are 16 levels in total. They all kinda suck and it might be hard to know where you are supposed to go. So if you get frustrated and give up that's cool. Anyways, if your at all curious about how this game got made, I made a video on it.

Be cool, stay in school!
